entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 18
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 14
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
